entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
